meta.name: description
meta.content: The Valparaiso Community Schools has made a commitment to excellence. Parents and community members are invited to reinforce this commitment by being involved in the schools and working together with faculty and staff to provide the best educational opportunities for all Valparaiso students.

img.alt: Click here for EXTENDED eLEARNING INFORMATION DUE TO SCHOOL CLOSURES
State Champion Unified Track and Field Team

div.div:
Valparaiso Community Schools has made a commitment to excellence. Parents and community members are invited to reinforce this commitment by being involved in the schools and working together with faculty and staff to provide the best educational opportunities for all Valparaiso students.
Please click the "Read more" button below to view an update on the DLI pilot program posted on February 19th, 2020.
Click the headline to learn about resources for families.
Click the headline to read the latest DLI pilot program update.
